original_text:
“The Lord possessed me at the beginning of his work,
    the first of his acts of old.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그 조화의 시작 곧 태초에 일하시기 전에 나를 가지셨으며

sentences.original_text: The Lord possessed me at the beginning of his work
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 그의 행사의 시작에 나를 소유하셨다

sentences.original_text: the first of his acts of old.
